title: In-memory Engine: assert fails region 26972 is prepared for write before, but it is not the current region
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

```
[2024/10/23 10:38:04.229 +08:00] [FATAL] [lib.rs:479] ["region 26972 is prepared for write before, but it is not the current region"] [backtrace="   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}
             at workspace/source/tikv/components/tikv_util/src/lib.rs:478:18
   1: <alloc::boxed::Box<F,A> as core::ops::function::Fn<Args>>::call
             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:2029:9
      std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/panicking.rs:783:13
   2: std::panicking::begin_panic_handler::{{closure}}
             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/panicking.rs:657:13

             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:171:18

             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/panicking.rs:645:5
   5: core::panicking::panic_fmt
             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/panicking.rs:72:14
   6: <in_memory_engine::write_batch::RegionCacheWriteBatch as engine_traits::write_batch::WriteBatch>::prepare_for_region
             at workspace/source/tikv/components/in_memory_engine/src/write_batch.rs:498:13
      <hybrid_engine::observer::write_batch::HybridObservableWriteBatch as engine_traits::write_batch::WriteBatch>::prepare_for_region
             at workspace/source/tikv/components/hybrid_engine/src/observer/write_batch.rs:106:9
   7: <raftstore::coprocessor::read_write::write_batch::WriteBatchWrapper<WB> as engine_traits::write_batch::WriteBatch>::prepare_for_region
             at workspace/source/tikv/components/raftstore/src/coprocessor/read_write/write_batch.rs:119:13

             at workspace/source/tikv/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/apply.rs:546:9
      raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyDelegate<EK>::handle_raft_committed_entries
             at workspace/source/tikv/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/apply.rs:1133:9
   8: raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyFsm<EK>::handle_apply
             at workspace/source/tikv/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/apply.rs:4094:9
   9: raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyFsm<EK>::handle_tasks
             at workspace/source/tikv/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/apply.rs:4448:25
  10: <raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyPoller<EK> as batch_system::batch::PollHandler<raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyFsm<EK>,raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ControlFsm>>::handle_normal
             at workspace/source/tikv/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/apply.rs:4746:9
  11: batch_system::batch::Poller<N,C,Handler>::poll

             at workspace/source/tikv/components/tikv_util/src/sys/thread.rs:438:13

             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:155:18
  13: std::thread::Builder::spawn_unchecked_::{{closure}}::{{closure}}
             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/thread/mod.rs:529:17
      <core::panic::unwind_safe::AssertUnwindSafe<F> as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once
             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/panic/unwind_safe.rs:272:9

      std::thread::Builder::spawn_unchecked_::{{closure}}
             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/thread/mod.rs:528:30
      core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once{{vtable.shim}}
             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/ops/function.rs:250:5
  14: <alloc::boxed::Box<F,A> as core::ops::function::FnOnce<Args>>::call_once
             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:2015:9
      <alloc::boxed::Box<F,A> as core::ops::function::FnOnce<Args>>::call_once
             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:2015:9
      std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start
             at root/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:108:17
  15: start_thread
  16: __GI___clone
"] [location=components/in_memory_engine/src/write_batch.rs:498] [thread_name=apply-0] [thread_id=125]
```

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

Nightly 4ebb3001b22d13a5ec830aa32c4bb88e385a1ef0

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

Run HA test https://tcms.pingcap.net/dashboard/executions/plan/7639559

### What did you expect?

No assert failure
